channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Witness the Catastrophic Results of Identity Theft by Illegal Immigrants
item.description: Dan Kluver’s life was upended, and he’s not alone.

item.title: A massive tech update will bring faster, cheaper trading to Wall Street. Get ready for stocks on a blockchain
item.description: Giants like JPMorgan Chase and BlackRock are embracing 'tokenization,' while upstarts like Robinhood and Kraken race ahead.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren Yells ‘Soak The Rich’ While Making Millions On Wall Street

item.title: Pope Leo warns Gen Z and Gen Alpha that using AI too much could limit their potential: ‘Don’t ask it to do your homework’
item.description: As Gen Z turns to ChatGPT en masse, the pope is sounding the alarm about the erosion of critical thinking skills.

item.title: Bishops Vote To Prohibit Trans Surgeries And Hormone Treatment In Catholic Hospitals
item.description: Catholic teaching on gender is clear, but many Catholic hospitals have blatantly ignored it and performed transgender surgeries.

item.title: Former Zelensky Spox: Ukraine Must Sign Peace Deal To Avoid Even Greater Losses
item.description: 'Every subsequent deal for Ukraine will only be worse - because we are losing. We are losing people, territory, and the economy,' Iuliia Mendel said.
